sentences.en: Just do one more exercise in this workbook.
sentences.cn: 就再做一道这本练习册中的练习吧。

sentences.en: No more new fonts may be applied in this workbook.
sentences.cn: 本工作簿不能再使用其他新字体.

sentences.en: Permission to the workbook you are referencing is currently restricted.
sentences.cn: 您正在引用的工作簿的权限目前受到限制.

sentences.en: Protecting a workbook does not stop users from editing cells.
sentences.cn: 保护工作簿并不会阻止用户编辑单元格.

sentences.en: Storage card not found. Insert card or save workbook in main memory.
sentences.cn: 找不到存储卡. 插入卡或将工作簿保存于主内存中.

sentences.en: This project mainly to achieve a workbook management system.
sentences.cn: 本工程主要实现工作簿管理系统.

sentences.en: This shares your workbook and then prevents change tracking from being removed.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法可以共享工作簿并可以避免丢失修订记录.

sentences.en: This workbook contains queries to external data that refresh automatically.
sentences.cn: 该工作簿中含有对自动刷新的外部数据的查询.

sentences.en: This workbook is currently referenced by another workbook and cannot be closed.
sentences.cn: 当前工作簿正由其他工作簿引用,不能关闭.

sentences.en: To collect the workbook and fill in the workbook statistic weekly.
sentences.cn: 每周收好周报并做好统计工作.

sentences.en: To hide a workbook window, click Hide on the Window menu.
sentences.cn: 要隐藏工作簿窗口, 可单击“窗口”菜单中的“隐藏”命令.

sentences.en: To share this workbook, it must contain at least one visible worksheet.
sentences.cn: 共享工作簿至少需有一张以上可见工作表.

sentences.en: We are excited to begin the materials for this workbook.
sentences.cn: 我们很兴奋开始本工作手册的内容.

sentences.en: Workbook must contain at least one visible sheet.
sentences.cn: 工作簿内至少需有一张以上未隐藏的工作表.

sentences.en: You can delete any worksheet in a workbook.
sentences.cn: 可以删除工作簿中的任何工作表.

sentences.en: You can show or hide any worksheet in a workbook.
sentences.cn: 可以在工作簿中显示或隐藏任何工作表.

words.tran_cn: 切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的
工作日的；日常的；普通的，平凡的
日常的，工作日的；平凡的
专心工作的人；醉心于工作的人；为免遭辞退而工作过份卖力的人
工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a school book containing questions and exercises
